about_the_game:
Try out "El Panadero -The Baker"! A new 2D Arcade style featuring hand drawn art and lots of punching.

The demo will let you try out 10 minutes of main gameplay.
Both main characters available
Stomp, punch and shoot your way around Guanajuato city.
If you're fast enough, and tough enough, you can catch a glimpse of the next stages!
detailed_description:
Try out "El Panadero -The Baker"! A new 2D Arcade style featuring hand drawn art and lots of punching.

The demo will let you try out 10 minutes of main gameplay.
Both main characters available
Stomp, punch and shoot your way around Guanajuato city.
If you're fast enough, and tough enough, you can catch a glimpse of the next stages!
name: El Panadero Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Arcade Style 2D Bakery Based Brawling. Play the hand drawn quest of a couple of bakers that got their bakery destroyed by invaders from SPACE! Action game with some platforming and couch multiplayer.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America
